mapper.select: select std_id from bms.`bd_learn_info` where learn_id = #{learnId}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `bms`.bd_sub_order so LEFT JOIN `bms`.bd_student_order o ON so.`order_no` = o.`order_no` LEFT JOIN `bms`.bd_serial_suborder ss ON ss.`sub_order_no` = so.`sub_order_no` LEFT JOIN `bms`.bd_student_serial s ON s.`serial_no` = ss.`serial_no` WHERE o.`learn_id` = #{learnId} AND so.`item_code` = #{itemCode} AND so.`sub_order_status` = '2' AND s.`serial_status` IN ('2', '3')
SELECT l.learn_id learnId, l.`recruit_type` recruitType FROM `bms`.bd_learn_info l LEFT JOIN `bms`.bd_student_info i ON i.`std_id` = l.`std_id` WHERE i.`mobile` = #{mobile} AND l.`is_completed` = '0'

select c.`coupon_id` from `bms`.bd_coupon c LEFT JOIN `bms`.bd_coupon_trigger t ON t.`coupon_id` = c.`coupon_id` where now() BETWEEN c.`publish_start_time` AND c.`publish_expire_time` AND c.`is_allow` = '1' AND t.`c_trigger_type` = '2'
select user_id from `bms`.bd_student_info r left join `bms`.bd_learn_info bli on bli.`std_id` = r.`std_id` where bli.learn_id = #{learnId}

SELECT b.`std_id`, b.`std_name`, b.`id_type`, b.`id_card`, b.`sex`, b.`birthday`, b.`nation`, b.`political_status`, b.`rpr_type`, b.`rpr_province_code`, b.`rpr_city_code`, b.`rpr_district_code`, b.`zip_code`, b.`now_province_code`, b.`now_city_code`, b.`now_district_code`, b.`address`, b.`mobile`, b.`emergency_contact`, b.`job_type`, b.`wp_province_code`, b.`wp_city_code`, b.`wp_district_code`, b.`wp_address`, date_format(b.`wp_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') as wp_time, b.`wp_telephone`, b.`address_edit_time`, l.`grade`, b.`address_edit_time`, b.`now_street_code`, b.`now_province_name`, b.`now_city_name`, b.`now_district_name`, b.`now_street_name` FROM `bms`.`bd_student_info` b left join `bms`.bd_learn_info l on l.std_id = b.std_id WHERE l.learn_id = #{learn_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

SELECT b.`std_id`, b.`std_name`, b.`id_type`, b.`id_card`, b.`sex`, b.`birthday`, b.`nation`, b.`political_status`, b.`rpr_type`, b.`rpr_province_code`, b.`rpr_city_code`, b.`rpr_district_code`, b.`zip_code`, b.`now_province_code`, b.`now_city_code`, b.`now_district_code`, b.`address`, b.`mobile`, b.`emergency_contact`, b.`job_type`, b.`wp_province_code`, b.`wp_city_code`, b.`wp_district_code`, b.`wp_address`, date_format(b.`wp_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') as wp_time, b.`wp_telephone`, b.`user_id` FROM `bms`.`bd_student_info` b WHERE b.`id_card` = #{idCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

SELECT r.`recruit`, r.`recruit_dp_id` AS dpId, r.`recruit_campus_id` AS campusId, r.`recruit_campus_manager` AS campusManager FROM `bms`.bd_learn_rules r INNER JOIN `bms`.bd_learn_info l ON l.`learn_id` = r.`learn_id` WHERE l.`std_id` = #{stdId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY l.`create_time` DESC LIMIT 0, 1
